install.name: Easy Slider Pro
install.author: Turnkeye.com
install.description: Easy and powerful Ajax jQuey slider for Joomla!

param.name: width
param.label: Width of the slider (pixels)
param.description: Width of the slider in pixels

param.name: height
param.label: Height of the slider (pixels)
param.description: Height of the slider in pixels

param.name: auto
param.label: Automatic sliding
param.description: Automatic sliding, if enabled slides will be scrolled automatically.

param.name: hide_load
param.label: Show banner only after all images are loaded
param.description: If enabled, the banner will be shown only after all images of the banner are loaded.

param.name: delay_first
param.label: Delay before image scrolling start
param.description: Delay (in miliseconds) before the image scrolling start.

param.name: continuous
param.label: Continuous motion
param.description: If set to true clicking the next button when the slider reached the end will simply continue showing all of the slides again with continuous motion. Combining this option with auto (both set to true) you'll get endless animation.

param.name: speed
param.label: Speed
param.description: Animation speed in milliseconds, default value is 800

param.name: demo
param.label: Show default images
param.description: If enabled, default demo images will be shown, otherwise the defined images will be used (use 'Image names' field to define the images).

param.name: imagesfolder
param.label: Images folder
param.description: Relative path to the images folder, by default it is 'modules/mod_easy_slider/'

param.name: imagesnames
param.label: Image names
param.description: Image names separated with comma, for example: 1.gif, 2.gif, 3.gif etc.

param.name: imagecaptions
param.label: ALT descriptions
param.description: ALT descriptions of the images separate with comma (good for SEO)
param.default: Image 1 Caption, Image 2 Caption, Image 3 Caption

param.name: imagelinks
param.label: URLs
param.description: URLs of the banners separated with comma
